channel.title: Need a fix/New client source for matrix 718
channel.description: My current client has a huge memory leak and its all obfuscated ebonic tribespeak to me, can someone please tell me how I can fix it or send me a link to a matrix 718 client source that wont eat 3Gb of RAM after 2 hours.
